QuestData.Title: Stupid Drizle!
QuestData.Description: Stupid, stupid Drizle! I told him not to go!$B$BDrizle wanted to steal more honey from Felpaw Village... you know, just west of here? You can see it from the cliff...$B$BAnyway... I told him it was a dumb idea but he went anyway, and then the Deadwood tribe got him, and... and...$B$BSniff...$B$BI don't know what they're gonna do! Please find him, $gMr.:Ms.; $R! Even if he is a dummy! I don't want Drizle to get eaten!
